author: Andrew Taylor and Alan Fram
title: Masked House Members Debate $500 Billion Coronavirus Aid Package as 26 Million Americans File for Unemployment
description: A nearly $500 billion measure helping businesses and hospitals ride out the coronavirus' devastation edged toward House passage Thursday.
content: (WASHINGTON) — A nearly $500 billion measure helping businesses and hospitals ride out the coronavirus’ devastation edged toward House passage Thursday, as lawmakers’ face masks and bandannas added an eerie tone to Congress’ effort to aid a staggered nation.… [+5666 chars]
